name: Architecture 2 - Jigsaw and Sliding Puzzles
description:
Enjoy this entertaining puzzle game for the whole family.
It includes two types of puzzles and 4 levels of difficulty: Jigsaw puzzle and sliding puzzle.
It contains 32 beautiful images of architecture theme. And a total of 256 puzzles to complete.

Get all the stars to finish the game 100%! It's a challenge!
